name: Space (Tri) Jam
description:
A game made in around 3-5ish hours for the Trijam Event. I interpreted the theme of "Don't learn from your mistakes" as a game where you can't really find new mechanics to use to your advantage, so all you can do is throw the ball and git gud.

WASD to move, space to jump, Shift to increase your speed, left mouse to shoot the ball in the hoop.
